glossy.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the glossy surface of the leaves
glossy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that is glossy has an attractive appearance on the surface that may hide something less pleasant
glossy.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a magazine that is printed on good-quality shiny paper, usually with lots of colour pictures
glossy.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a photograph printed on shiny paper
